DESCRIPTION.P: Scicos compiled diagram data structure contains all information needed to simulate the system (see scicosim).

ITEM.label: cpr: Scilab tlist (called %cpr by default), Scicos compiled
ITEM.SP: diagram data structure defined by the formal name 'cpr' and containing the following fields:

ITEM.label: state
ITEM.SP: : Scilab tlist contains initial state (see scicos_state).

ITEM.label: sim
ITEM.SP: : Scilab tlist. Usually generated by Scicos Compile menu (see scicos_sim).

ITEM.label: cor
ITEM.SP: : is a list with same recursive structure as scs_m each leaf contains the index of associated block in cpr data structure.

ITEM.label: corinv
ITEM.SP: : corinv(i) is the path of i th block defined in cpr data structure in the scs_m data structure.
